author: "Hemmingsen, Niels, 1513-1600"
title: "A Postill, or Exposition of the Gospels that are usually read in the churches of God, upon the Sundayes and Feast dayes of Saintes, written by Nicolas Heminge ..., And translated into English by Arthur Golding"
imprint: "London: imprinted for George Bishop and Thomas Wodcocke, [1578]"
